skins.selfIntroduction: Submarine Surcouf of Iris Libre, that's who I am. "Cruiser submarine"? Ah, are you talking about my gorgeous body which matches that of a cruiser~? Well, my firepower matches that of a cruiser, too! I bump into people quite a lot, but don't worry about that. Hahaha?
skins.acquisition: Salut~! I am Surcouf! "What's a ship with the physique of a cruiser doing with submarine equipment"? Hey! You've got it all wrong! My looks may be deceiving, but I'm a fully qualified submarine! Anyhoo, it's nice meeting you~
skins.details: Commander, why don't we design a flag for the fleet? Let's make it look like the Iris Libre flag~
skins.secretaryIdle1: You appointed me as your secretary because you were so enamored with my gorgeous body, weren't you? Spot on, aren't I~? Don't be so shy, I won't get upset with you~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You sure are hard at work, Commander... I'll join you and help out! Although what am I supposed to help with...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, have you seen my darling Passepartout? Ah, that's what I call my floatplane. He's my BFF~
skins.secretaryTouch: Eat a lot, sleep a lot, fight a lot! And everything else is your responsibility? I think I can dig this way of life~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if you wanna fondle 'em, just say so first~

skins.shipDescription: Hmm? Commander, are you shopping as well? If so, why don't you come along and take a look around? ... Huh? Of course you can't climb on. That'd be illegal.
skins.acquisition: Hmm? Commander, are you shopping as well? If so, why don't you come along and take a look around? ... Huh? Of course you can't climb on. That'd be illegal.
skins.login: Commander, are you ready? Then we're off to the next stop~
skins.details: This scooter really is fantastic! A good buy for a good price~ Lucky me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you can give me puppy-dog eyes all you want, but I won't share my ice cream... F-fine, just one lick, got it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My twin-gun turrets are also on vacation today! Gotta work hard and play hard!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Uhh, I don't think I'll bring the puppy with me next time... He's way too jumpy and almost even fell off the scooter once...
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, you finally noticed, Commander! That's right, I put my hair up just for today's ride! This is your only chance to see it like this.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I can't believe you. You almost made me drop my ice cream!

skins.shipDescription: Mmmh~ Bonjour, Commander~ Nothing feels better than the waves lapping at your skin~ Oh, Commander, why don't you come lie down and experience it for yourself?
skins.acquisition: Mmmh~ Bonjour, Commander~ Nothing feels better than the waves lapping at your skin~ Oh, Commander, why don't you come lie down and experience it for yourself?
skins.login: Hey, Commander, done anything fun lately? I wanna know!
skins.details: Sure, I go in the water all the time since I'm a submarine, but it's nice to just relax by the beach every now and then! *yaaaawn*... A girl needs her vacation time, you know~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey, Commander! Just lie on your back and I'll cover you with sand~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Go get the camera, Commander! I wanna take a photo of this.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Passepartout, could you get me some sunscreen? Oh, and Commander, would you mind rubbing it on for me?
skins.secretaryTouch: You're head over heels for my gorgeous body, aren't you? Heheh, stare all you want, because I don't mind?
